price: Na kwa yakini huu Umma wenu ni Umma mmoja, na Mimi ni Mola wenu Mlezi, basi nicheni Mimi.
arabic: وَإِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱتَّقُونِ
footnotes: Na tukawaambia wawafikishie watu wao: Hakika hii Dini niliyo kutumeni muifikishe ni Dini moja kwa mintarafu ya Imani na misingi ya sharia. Na hakika nyinyi ni umma mmoja katika vizazi vyote. Miongoni mwao wapo walio ongoka, na wapo walio potoka. Na Mimi ndiye Mola wenu Mlezi niliye kuamrisheni muifuate, basi iogopeni adhabu yangu pindi mkiasi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-ittaqūni
